action.action-desc: Mrs. Kim (for herself and Ms. Stevens) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Student Support and Academic Enrichment Grant program to promote career awareness in accounting as part of a well-rounded STEM educational experience.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Accounting STEM Pursuit Act of 2025.

section.header: Accounting as part of a well-rounded educational experience
section.text: Subpart 1 of part A of title IV of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7111 et seq.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subclause (VI), by striking or at the end;
by redesignating subclause (VII) as subclause (VIII); and
by inserting after subclause (VI) the following new subclause:

subclause.text: accounting education, including accounting career awareness; or

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (I), by striking or at the end;
by redesignating subparagraph (J) as subparagraph (K); and
by inserting after subparagraph (I) the following new subparagraph:

activities to promote the development, implementation, and strengthening of programs to teach accounting, including increasing access to high-quality accounting courses for students through grade 12 who are members of groups underrepresented in accounting careers; or
